name: Glazing Vision Ltd
description:
Glazing Vision Ltd is the UK’s leading manufacturer of innovative glass rooflight solutions. Our range includes standard, fixed and opening rooflights (sliding or hinged) with a comprehensive in-house bespoke design service available to cater for your exact individual rooflight needs and ultimate glazing vision. Be this for increased light, ventilation or roof access Glazing Vision can guide you to an expert rooflight solution. 

Boasting minimal internal framework and concealed motors on our entire rooflight range we maximise daylight, minimise framework, any size, any shape, anywhere! This makes Glazing Vision the first choice for architects delivering an elegant, innovative and functional rooflight every time.
